text: Finding Bliss is a 2009 movie. It is a romantic comedy about the adult film industry. The movie stars Leelee Sobieski, Denise Richards and Kristen Johnston. It was released in June 2010 in the United States. The movie was given very negative reviews by critics. ==References== Category:2009 romantic comedy movies Category:2000s English-language movies
title: Finding Bliss
